alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Lower Jefferson; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Tyler; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 15 at 2:33PM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 11 AM CST TUESDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 17 expected. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 16 expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central, southwest and west central Louisiana and southeast Texas. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 11 AM CST Tuesday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 6 PM Tuesday to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
